title: Ticket #5589: Create a "don't always run post" DAGMan test
description:
We have a bunch of job_dagman_always_run_post tests, but we don't have a test that tests the opposite case, which we probably should. (Have the PRE script fail and make sure the POST script doesn't get run.)

If we want to be a little bit extra tricky, we could set DAGMAN_ALWAYS_RUN_POST to true and then pass -DontAlwaysRunPost on command line, to make sure the command-line argument properly overrides the config knob.
remarks:
2016-Apr-01 11:58:55 by wenger:
I'm going to mark this as abandoned, because job_dagman_always_run_post-B and job_dagman_always_run_post-C actually make sure the POST script isn't run when it shouldn't be.
